title.rendered: New Logo for Diane von Furstenberg by Jonny Lu Studio

content.rendered: (Est. 1972) “Diane von Furstenberg founded her eponymous line in 1972. It has since become a global luxury fashion brand celebrated for its bold and creative approach to color and print, and admired for its sensual femininity. Renowned for its iconic wrap dress and signature prints, DVF now offers a full collection of ready-to-wear and accessories, and has established itself as a leader of creativity in the fashion industry. In May 2016, Jonathan Saunders joined DVF as the brand’s Chief Creative Officer, overseeing all design and creative. Founder Diane remains Chairman of DVF, and continues to devote much of her time to her many philanthropic endeavors.Headquartered in New York City, DVF has a global distribution network in over 55 countries and 1500 points of sale including 148 DVF owned and partnered stores throughout North and South America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia Pacific.”
